author: Kathryn Watson
title: Trump and allies strike markedly different tone on China over pandemic
description: Some of the president's allies are criticizing China and urging the U.S. to hold it accountable for the virus.
content: As Americans adapt to a period of isolation to arrest the spread of the coronavirus crisis while their leaders reevaluate how to move forward, President Trump and many of his allies appear to hold strikingly different views about whether China should be blame… [+3522 chars]
